subtitle:
1
00:00:03,000 --> 00:00:09,500
Tâi-oân-jī kap Tâi-gí siaⁿ-ūn siōng-chi̍p
Taiwanese Characters and Phonology: Part 1

2
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:12,800
Lóng-chóng hun nn̄g chi̍p
It is divided into two parts in total

3
00:00:13,000 --> 00:00:18,500
Siōng-chi̍p beh kóng--ê sī siaⁿ-bó kap ūn-bó
Part 1 covers Initials and Finals

4
00:00:19,000 --> 00:00:22,500
Ūn-bó hong-bīn ū ki-pún bó-im
Regarding finals, there are basic vowels,

5
00:00:23,000 --> 00:00:24,800
Phīⁿ-hòa bó-im
nasalized vowels,

6
00:00:25,000 --> 00:00:27,500
Phīⁿ-im ūn-bóe ūn-bó
nasal-ending finals,

7
00:00:28,000 --> 00:00:29,800
Âu-sat-im
glottal stops,

8
00:00:30,000 --> 00:00:32,000
Hàn-gí ji̍p-im
and Sinitic entering tones.

9
00:00:32,000 --> 00:00:33,800
Chit kúi pō͘-hūn
These sections

10
00:00:34,000 --> 00:00:36,500
Chiàu sūn-sī lâi kóng
will be discussed in order
